website_summaries.verdict: If you love MAC and long-wearing lipstick, these pretty mattes are likely to impress. Available in 33 shades, so you're sure to find your holy grail or two.
pros: Earns praise for the soft, matte finish
Classic bullet lipstick that comes in lots of colors, from nudes to jewel tones to unique deep blues and dark purples
Cult reds include Ruby Woo and Lady Danger
Made by a brand that has a loyal following
cons: Some colors wear longer than others

customer_reviews.title: and smears on my low lip was laughed at that I looked like a clown
customer_reviews.text: Too light, and smears on my low lip was laughed at that I looked like a clown. so sad
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Seel

customer_reviews.title: MAC matte lipstick KINDA SEXY
customer_reviews.text: Love MAC matte lipstick. This color is a great neutral pink in my opinion and would work well on many skin tones. This is what Yolanda Foster from the Real Housewives of Beverly Hills wore on the last season's reunion show and I loved it! Fortunately I was able to find a blog about her and what makeup she was wearing for that show. Can't find the color in department stores online for some reason. Found here on Amazon. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Love this color
customer_reviews.text: The color was a little lighter than the actual product but I do love it.
customer_reviews.author: dia singh

customer_reviews.title: great color
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this based on other recommendations and am glad I did- Great Color- non- smelly and lasts just long enough- (I don't like all day color as the lipstick is far to dry) Nice product
customer_reviews.author: HughMann

customer_reviews.title: Great shade. Nice matte finish
customer_reviews.text: Great shade. Nice matte finish. Just make sure your lips are not cracked or dry before putting it on. Goes great with smoky eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great! A very nice product! Love it! You can buy it that will not regret! Very good product for sure!
customer_reviews.text: Great! A very nice product! Love it! You can buy it that will not regret! Very good product for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the way the color look on my lips, great lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Albertha Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Better to try in person
customer_reviews.text: I think it just comes down to the fact that lipstick you see on Pinterest versus on YOU can be quite different. Better to try in person.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is not what I expected but good for use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful nude color and I loved the little purple gift bag it came in.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: This lipstick was not as mauve as I normally like but I added a nice deep mauve lip pencil before I applied the color and it turned out lovely.
customer_reviews.author: HKG

customer_reviews.title: Don't have an opinion
customer_reviews.text: It's alrrriiiiiiigghhhhhttt I don't have the lipstick on me, nor do I remember putting it on- so I can't really give a legitimate review lol. Sorry guys!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany McKinney

customer_reviews.title: I really like neutral and nude colors
customer_reviews.text: I really like neutral and nude colors. I was a little surprised when I opened this one and put it on. It is more of a brownish color. I do like it but I am a little disappointed and I wish it would have turned out to be more of a peachy nude color.
customer_reviews.author: Mhubbard

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Like the taxture. Even though the color is different than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: sharmin shapna

customer_reviews.title: Kinda Awesome, Actually
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color! Nude with a hint of coral. It's a creamy matte, so it's not drying or leaving you with weird lines. Love the smell of it! Almost vanilla or something. Shipping was fast. I purchased here to use my Amazon card.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: ... know what it is about this shade... It is amazing and makes you look beautiful and young and
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what it is about this shade... It is amazing and makes you look beautiful and young and happy
customer_reviews.author: salome

customer_reviews.title: Color not as imagined
customer_reviews.text: Mac lipstick is moist and delicious but unfortunately, I did not find this "kinda sexy" AT ALL. The color was orange-y peach and that's not how the color "read" online. Guess my girlfriend just scored a new lipstick!
customer_reviews.author: Valeriek

customer_reviews.title: very pretty color. Stays on for a long time
customer_reviews.text: very pretty color. Stays on for a long time, even when you eat. will purchase again, definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Elda B

customer_reviews.title: This is a great color and can be pretty much worn by anyone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great color and can be pretty much worn by anyone .. a great everyday color and a great nude.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Drozd

customer_reviews.title: Mac Matt lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick. To me it is a great color. It arrived on time!
customer_reviews.author: Dinah Britt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. I get compliments all the time
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Very nice. I get compliments all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Carolo44

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this color for a long time and finally got it! I liked it a lot. It's a good nude for "not so white" skins. Sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela P.

customer_reviews.title: Light color and matt finish
customer_reviews.text: I have a medium complexion with yellow/olive undertones. I thought the color was pretty, but not on me. The lipstick is a matt finish and somewhat dry. I felt I had to put chapstick underneath it, or it needed a bit of gloss on top. Guess the matt look is not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Eskie Lover

customer_reviews.title: tried to love it but wrong color for me- Im a cool ...
customer_reviews.text: tried to love it but wrong color for me- Im a cool tone base and this is too peachy for my skin tone. reminds me of the 1960's pastel lipstick-chalky peach color with a whiter base....would look great on warmer/darker skin tones! Velvet teddy or half and half are better colors for me...
customer_reviews.author: hlcnurse

product_meta.title: Kinda Sexy MAC Matte Lipstick
product_meta.description: MAC KINDA SEXY 1(ONE) MATTE LIPSTICK @3g/0.1oz (new/unused/smoke free home) (just as pictured)

Lipstick Creme Enriched with Vitamin E to moisturize dry skin and lips soft , smooth, long-lasting color all day Highlights of Frost Lipstick is the softness of the colors and a little sparkle
Make the lips look plump and lively throughout the day
Lipstick Creme Enriched with Vitamin E
